name: MU Online Image File
summary: Learn about .OZB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The OZB file should be converted into a .JPG, .BMP, .TGA, or other customizable graphic file in order to be edited by an image editor then converted back into an OZB file. The OZB file can be converted using the MU Online Image Converter.
NOTE: Other similar image files used by MU Online are .OZJ and .OZT.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
